dct_title_s: [Series of maps from Palmer's Bible atlas]
dct_alternative_sm: Bible atlas, or, sacred geography delineated : in a complete series of scriptural maps, drawn from the best authorities, ancient and modern
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "English miles" and "Jewish furlongs".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Map [1] has 2 inset maps: Eden -- Contiguous extremities of Asia and America.
Appears in Palmer's The Bible atlas, or, sacred geography delineated : in a complete series of scriptural maps, drawn from the best authorities, ancient and modern.
